thread.title: Sang-Moon Bae's reaction to his disastrous shot will break your heart
thread.title_full: Sang-Moon Bae's reaction to his disastrous shot will break your heart

author: Nick Schwartz
title: Sang-Moon Bae's reaction to his disastrous shot will break your heart
text:
Sang-Moon Bae's reaction to his disastrous shot will break your heart USA Today Sports 15 hrs ago Nick Schwartz The United States edged the International team to win the President’s Cup 15½-14½ Sunday despite winning just five of the 12 singles matches on the final day. The Internationals had a chance to force a tie, but a brutal finish to the 18th hole by Sang-Moon Bae resulted in Bill Haas clinching the Cup for the Americans.
AdChoices RELATED : US WINS PRESIDENTS CUP
Trailing by one on the 18th, Bae had to win the hole to tie — but he mishit his difficult third shot into the green on the par-5, and the ball nearly rolled all the way back to his feet.
Bae had a chance to be a hero in his home country, but after his missing the green with his third shot and failing to hole out with his fourth, he conceded the hole and the Cup-clinching point to Haas. Bae was a captain’s pick for the Presidents Cup, and the event was his last before beginning mandatory military service .
